Articles.Content:
"The treaty was signed, all of Kerbol can now have peace. Under one government and one flag, the Kerban's have conquered the atrocities there home planet. From hunger, war, environmental damage, Kerbals only have one place to look to, the stars.

Under the "Make Things Go Boom Boom" law, the UKG (United Kerbal Government) has decided to create the Kerbal Space Agency (KSA), with the KSA's goal to increase a Kerbal presence in space, conduct science, and seeing how many boosters you can fit on one rocket. Sadly, the UKG does not have a lot of money to spare, so it is looking to members of the Kerban nations (aka you guys)."

I didn't know whether to put this under missions reports or fan works, but I figured it would work best here.

Since career mode isn't out yet, I figured i'd try to make a game that I and you guys could play, so here we go.

The KSA needs funding, and you guys provide it. To play the game, all you have to do is say, I wanna play. You will be given 3,000 kbucks (KB) and the you bank account info will be kept on this page. What you will do is submit mission reports, fund them by yourself or collaboration with forum members from your bank (as the missions get bigger and complex that will be required). Or if forum members see a mission they want to contribute to they can. With the fund given, I will attempt to carry out these missions (in the game), less funds=higher chance of failure, more funds=higher chance of success. Each mission has a prize. If the mission is successful, you get the percentage of the prize money that you contributed (aka you were responsible for 50% of the funding, you get 50% of the prize). If the mission fails, you lose all the money you contributed. For the missions you propose, I will determine the award amount. When the mission is finished, ill write up a mission report.

Now a tip, you should follow the natural progression of a space program. No testing will be done, so I would recommend starting off with something like a sub orbital satellite and going from there. But in the end, its your KB, if yall go broke pushing me, well sorry

So any interest, questions, am I making sense (its 3 in the morning when I write this). I think it would be fun, not only do I get missions and money (like a career mode haha) but you get to decide what I do, while figuring out what to fund. Keep in mind if I do go through with this, I may change the rules slightly in the name of fairness, so don't get pissy.

Also Mods I have Installed

I plan on using all of them since Remotetech add need for satellite and Ordan/Mapsat gives science.
